description: Try our easy to follow Seafood Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Seafood Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter and oil in a pressure cooker over high heat.
Add seafood and cook for 1-2 minutes until prawns have just changed colour. Transfer to a bowl with a slotted spoon. Cover and set aside.
Add leek and garlic to pan. Cook for 5 minutes until softened.
Add rice and stir for 2 minutes. Add wine and stock, secure and lock lid.
Set to 2/HIGH pressure. When pressure indicator rises and steam escapes steadily, lower heat and cook for 10 minutes.
Remove from heat and when pressure indicator has returned to original position, turn valve to steam release position. Once remaining steam has been released open the cooker.
Stir in the seafood, parsley, lemon rind and lemon juice.
Return to low heat for 5 minutes. Spoon into bowls and serve.
